title: Baked Cream Cheese Salmon
ingredients: ['250ml reduced salt soy sauce', '3 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons whole grain Dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies or to taste', '4 (225g) salmon fillets or steaks', '170g cream cheese, softened', '3 spring onions, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon whole grain Dijon mustard', '125ml teriyaki sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds']
